<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adding view_changer role to old users who have project_manager role.  Any new users created should have this role by default.</description>
        <name>Add view_changer role to Project_Manager</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.log("User Role Migration started: For using the Project_Manager Role");
var _pluginEnabled = GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.project_management_v3");
if(_pluginEnabled) {
    // upgrade users
    upgradeUsersToNewPMRole();
}

function upgradeUsersToNewPMRole()
{
    // get PM, View roles
    var _pmRole = getRoleRecord('project_manager');
    var _viewChangerRole = getRoleRecord('view_changer');
    if(_pmRole.next() && _viewChangerRole.next()) {
        // grab all users who have pm role
        var _pmUsers = getUsersForRole(_pmRole.sys_id);
	var count=0;
        while(_pmUsers.next()) {
            // lets get their names, so we can display it
            var _userRec = getUserRecord(_pmUsers.user);
            if(!_userRec.next()) continue;
            // check if the user have vc role already
            var _userRole = getUserRoleRecord(_pmUsers.user, _viewChangerRole.sys_id);
            if(!_userRole.next()) {
                gs.log("Upgrading user " + _userRec.user_name + " to include view_changer role");
		var record = new GlideRecord("sys_user_has_role");
		record.initialize();
		// otherfields included_in_role, inherited ??
		record.setValue('user', _pmUsers.user);
		record.setValue('role', _viewChangerRole.sys_id);
		record.insert();
		count++;
            }
	}
    }
    gs.log((count==0?'No':count)+' users were upgraded!');
}

// --- helper methods to query user, role

function getRoleRecord(roleName)
{
    var roleRec = new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
    roleRec.addQuery("name", roleName);
    roleRec.query();
    return roleRec;
}

function getUsersForRole(roleId)
{
    var usersList = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
    usersList.addQuery("role", roleId);
    usersList.query();
    return usersList;
}

function getUserRecord(userId)
{
    var userRec = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    userRec.addQuery("sys_id", userId);
    userRec.query();
    return userRec;
}

function getUserRoleRecord(userId, roleId)
{
    var userRole = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
    userRole.addQuery("user", userId);
    userRole.addQuery("role", roleId);
    userRole.query();
    return userRole;
}
]]></script>
